Author: vito1977
Title: [ANN] BestMeta : esports community exchange platform
Body: Hello! tell me what is the difference between a private pre-sale and token pre-sale?

Author: vito1977
Title: [ANN] BestMeta : esports community exchange platform
Body: Hello! tell me what is the difference between a private pre-sale and token pre-sale?

Author: Celdric
Title: [ANN] BestMeta : esports community exchange platform
Body: Hello everybody,  My name is René "Celdric" Omlor and i am part of the BestMeta team. I apologize for the late response, but i'm sure our CM team will work faster from here on!  @JFry83 As of now, our focus lies on the development of the platform and its surroundings. Testing and finalizing the structure of our webinterface, polishing the smart-contracts and being able to go live as soon as possible, is what we are trying to achieve.  While we are working on this, our team is also communicating with potential partnerships (companies) to collaborate in the near future, onboarding of talents and their projects and getting a solid foundation to start right away, once the platform is finished.  @vito1977  The private pre-sale requires a higher minimum contribution to participate and requires direct communication with our core team, since it won't be handled through the BestMeta dashboard. The token pre-sale will be available through the BestMeta dashboard and will have lower requirements. In case you are interested to know more about the private pre-sale, please contact us through our website.  Kind regards, Celdric

Author: gabecolors
Title: [ANN] BestMeta : esports community exchange platform

Author: gabecolors
Title: [ANN] BestMeta : esports community exchange platform
Body: Check out this recent article on PCGamesN "Here's why PC gamers should learn to stop worrying and love cryptocurrency's blockchain" https://www.pcgamesn.com/blockchain-gaming-streaming-esports  “The biggest issue for me is that there is a lot of power in community fundraising but it was having the funds reaching the right people or the people with the ideas,” Dawson says. “I see a lot of people with fantastic ideas but they don’t see how they can make that possible. They don’t see the funds they can connect to, be it through direct endorsement or through the community fundraising.”
